protein.specific_function: Binds to, and destabilizes, ornithine decarboxylase which is then degraded. Also inhibits cellular uptake of polyamines by inactivating the polyamine uptake transporter. SMAD1/OAZ1/PSMB4 complex mediates the degradation of the CREBBP/EP300 repressor SNIP1

reference.reference_text: Tewari DS, Qian Y, Thornton RD, Pieringer J, Taub R, Mochan E, Tewari M: Molecular cloning and sequencing of a human cDNA encoding ornithine decarboxylase antizyme. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1994 Dec 14;1209(2):293-5.

Hayashi T, Matsufuji S, Hayashi S: Characterization of the human antizyme gene. Gene. 1997 Dec 12;203(2):131-9.
